title: How to Make Layered Margarita Bites

steps.headline: Combine the gelatin and boiling water together in a large bowl.
steps.description: Completely dissolve the gelatin by whisking the mixture for 2 minutes.

steps.headline: Add the tequila (or cold water).
steps.description: Also add the lime juice, whipped topping, and zest.

steps.headline: Stir everything until mixed thoroughly and the whipped topping is melted.
Pour the mixture into an 8-inch (20cm) square pan.
Place the pan in the refrigerator for 3 hours or until the Jello is firm.
Use a plastic knife and cut the Jello into 36 pieces.

text: Combine the gelatin and boiling water together in a large bowl. Completely dissolve the gelatin by whisking the mixture for 2 minutes. Add the tequila (or cold water). Also add the lime juice, whipped topping, and zest. Stir everything until mixed thoroughly and the whipped topping is melted.  Pour the mixture into an 8-inch (20cm) square pan.  Place the pan in the refrigerator for 3 hours or until the Jello is firm.  Use a plastic knife and cut the Jello into 36 pieces.  Serve and enjoy.
